name: Compa Chaos
description:
You did something to annoy your companion, so he wants to get away from you. Achieve your daily goals while still keeping an eye on him!

Features custom music.

It's our first game, so there's clearly a lot of issues. We might come back to it once the drain from using Love2D for so much in so little time goes away.

We're working on getting a fully working download available. Until then, you can download the source code here or view the GitHub page to download it from there. The .love file should also work if you download it. Each of these methods require you to have Love2D installed on your system.

If you use the x64 zipped version that includes an executable, the program will crash if you win. Due to a bug, this is essentially no different from any other version.
